00067 #define HASH_MAX 2713

00071 
00072 int
00073 plugin_get_running_state (struct scheduler_plugin *plugin)
00074 {
00075   return plugin->running_state;
00076 }
00077 
00078 void
00079 plugin_set_running_state (struct scheduler_plugin *plugin, int state)
00080 {
00081   if (plugin == NULL)
00082     return;
00083 
00084   plugin->running_state = state;
00085 }

00090 static unsigned int
00091 mkhash (char *name)
00092 {
00093   return g_str_hash (name) % HASH_MAX;
00094 }

00100 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*
00101  *
00102  * A minimalist HASH stucture
00103  *
00104  *---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00105 
00106 static struct hash *
00107 hash_init ()
00108 {
00109   struct hash *h = emalloc (sizeof (*h) * HASH_MAX + 1);
00110 
00111   return h;
00112 }
00113 
00114 static void
00115 hash_link_destroy (struct hash *h)
00116 {
00117   int i;
00118   if (h == NULL)
00119     return;
00120 
00121   if (h->next != NULL)
00122     hash_link_destroy (h->next);
00123 
00124   if (h->dependencies != NULL)
00125     {
00126       for (i = 0; h->dependencies[i] != NULL; i++)
00127         {
00128           cache_dec (h->dependencies[i]);
00129         }
00130       efree (&h->dependencies);
00131     }
00132 
00133   efree (&h->dependencies_ptr);
00134 
00135   arg_free_all (h->plugin->required_ports);
00136   arg_free_all (h->plugin->required_udp_ports);
00137   arg_free_all (h->plugin->required_keys);
00138   arg_free_all (h->plugin->mandatory_keys);
00139   arg_free_all (h->plugin->excluded_keys);
00140   efree (&h->plugin);
00141 
00142   if (h->ports != NULL)
00143     {
00144       for (i = 0; h->ports[i] != NULL; i++)
00145         {
00146           cache_dec (h->ports[i]);
00147         }
00148       efree (&h->ports);
00149     }
00150 
00151   efree (&h);
00152 }
00153 
00154 static void
00155 hash_destroy (struct hash *h)
00156 {
00157   int i;
00158 
00159   for (i = 0; i < HASH_MAX; i++)
00160     {
00161       hash_link_destroy (h[i].next);
00162     }
00163   efree (&h);
00164 }
00165 
00166 
00167 static int
00168 hash_add (struct hash *h, char *name, struct scheduler_plugin *plugin)
00169 {
00170   struct hash *l = emalloc (sizeof (struct hash));
00171   unsigned int idx = mkhash (name);
00172   nvti_t * nvti = nvticache_get_by_oid (arg_get_value (arg_get_value
00173     (plugin->arglist->value, "preferences"), "nvticache"),
00174       arg_get_value (plugin->arglist->value, "OID"));
00175   struct arglist *deps = str2arglist (nvti_dependencies (nvti));
00176   struct arglist *ports = str2arglist (nvti_required_ports (nvti));
00177 
00178   nvti_free (nvti);
00179   l->plugin = plugin;
00180   l->plugin->parent_hash = l;
00181   l->name = name;
00182   l->next = h[idx].next;
00183   h[idx].next = l;
00184   l->dependencies_ptr = NULL;
00185 
00186   if (deps == NULL)
00187     l->dependencies = NULL;
00188   else
00189     {
00190       struct arglist *al = deps;
00191       int i = 0;
00192       int num_deps = 0;
00193       while (al->next)
00194         {
00195           num_deps++;
00196           al = al->next;
00197         }
00198       l->dependencies = emalloc ((num_deps + 1) * sizeof (char *));
00199       al = deps;
00200       while (al->next != NULL)
00201         {
00202           l->dependencies[i++] = cache_inc (al->name);
00203           l->num_deps++;
00204           al = al->next;
00205         }
00206     }
00207 
00208   if (ports == NULL)
00209     l->ports = NULL;
00210   else
00211     {
00212       struct arglist *al = ports;
00213       int num_ports = 0;
00214       int i = 0;
00215       while (al->next != NULL)
00216         {
00217           num_ports++;
00218           al = al->next;
00219         }
00220 
00221       l->ports = emalloc ((num_ports + 1) * sizeof (char *));
00222       al = ports;
00223       while (al->next != NULL)
00224         {
00225           l->ports[i++] = cache_inc (al->name);
00226           al = al->next;
00227         }
00228     }
00229 
00230   arg_free_all (deps);
00231   arg_free_all (ports);
00232 
00233   return 0;
00234 }
00235 
00236 
00237 
00238 
00239 static struct hash *
00240 _hash_get (struct hash *h, char *name)
00241 {
00242   unsigned int idx = mkhash (name);
00243   struct hash *l = h[idx].next;
00244   while (l != NULL)
00245     {
00246       if (strcmp (l->name, name) == 0)
00247         return l;
00248       else
00249         l = l->next;
00250     }
00251   return NULL;
00252 }
00253 
00254 
00255 static struct hash **
00256 hash_get_deps_ptr (struct hash *h, char *name)
00257 {
00258   struct hash *l = _hash_get (h, name);
00259 
00260   if (l == NULL)
00261     return NULL;
00262 
00263   return l->dependencies_ptr;
00264 }
00265 
00266 static void
00267 hash_fill_deps (struct hash *h, struct hash *l)
00268 {
00269   int i, j = 0;
00270   if (l->num_deps == 0)
00271     return;
00272 
00273   l->dependencies_ptr =
00274     emalloc ((1 + l->num_deps) * sizeof (struct hash *));
00275   for (i = 0; l->dependencies[i]; i++)
00276     {
00277       struct hash *d = _hash_get (h, l->dependencies[i]);
00278       if (d != NULL)
00279         l->dependencies_ptr[j++] = d;
00280       else
00281         {
00282           gchar *path = g_path_get_dirname (l->plugin->arglist->name);
00283           if (g_ascii_strcasecmp (path, ".") != 0)
00284             {
00285               gchar *dep_with_path =
00286                 g_build_filename (path, l->dependencies[i], NULL);
00287               d = _hash_get (h, dep_with_path);
00288               g_free (dep_with_path);
00289             }
00290           g_free (path);
00291           if (d != NULL)
00292             {
00293               l->dependencies_ptr[j++] = d;
00294             }
00295           else
00296             {
00297               log_write
00298                 ("scheduler: %s depends on %s which could not be found, thus this dependency is not considered for execution sequence\n",
00299                  l->plugin->arglist->name, l->dependencies[i]);
00300             }
00301         }
00302     }
00303   l->dependencies_ptr[j] = NULL;
00304 }
00305 
00306 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00307 
00308 struct plist *
00309 pl_get (struct plist *list, char *name)
00310 {
00311   while (list != NULL)
00312     {
00313       if (strcmp (list->name, name) == 0)
00314         return list;
00315       else
00316         list = list->next;
00317     }
00318   return NULL;
00319 }

00322 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------*
00323  *                  *
00324  * Utilities                *
00325  *                  *
00326  *----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00327 
00328 
00329 
00330 void
00331 scheduler_mark_running_ports (plugins_scheduler_t sched,
00332                               struct scheduler_plugin *plugin)
00333 {
00334   char **ports = plugin->parent_hash->ports;
00335   int i;
00336 
00337   if (ports == NULL)
00338     return;
00339 
00340   for (i = 0; ports[i] != NULL; i++)
00341     {
00342       struct plist *pl = pl_get (sched->plist, ports[i]);
00343 
00344       if (pl != NULL)
00345         pl->occurences++;
00346       else
00347         {
00348           pl = emalloc (sizeof (struct plist));
00349           strncpy (pl->name, ports[i], sizeof (pl->name) - 1);  /* Share cache_inc() ? */
00350           pl->occurences = 1;
00351           pl->next = sched->plist;
00352           if (sched->plist != NULL)
00353             sched->plist->prev = pl;
00354           pl->prev = NULL;
00355           sched->plist = pl;
00356         }
00357     }
00358 }
00359 
00360 void
00361 scheduler_rm_running_ports (plugins_scheduler_t sched,
00362                             struct scheduler_plugin *plugin)
00363 {
00364   char **ports;
00365   int i;
00366 
00367   ports = plugin->parent_hash->ports;
00368 
00369   if (ports == NULL)
00370     return;
00371 
00372   for (i = 0; ports[i] != NULL; i++)
00373     {
00374       struct plist *pl = pl_get (sched->plist, ports[i]);
00375 
00376       if (pl != NULL)
00377         {
00378           pl->occurences--;
00379           if (pl->occurences == 0)
00380             {
00381               if (pl->next != NULL)
00382                 pl->next->prev = pl->prev;
00383 
00384               if (pl->prev != NULL)
00385                 pl->prev->next = pl->next;
00386               else
00387                 sched->plist = pl->next;
00388 
00389               efree (&pl);
00390             }
00391         }
00392       else
00393         printf ("Warning: scheduler_rm_running_ports failed ?! (%s)\n",
00394                 ports[i]);
00395     }
00396 }
00397 
00398 
00399 struct scheduler_plugin *
00400 plugin_next_unrun_dependencie (plugins_scheduler_t sched,
00401                                struct hash **dependencies_ptr)
00402 {
00403   int flag = 0;
00404   int i;
00405 
00406   if (dependencies_ptr == NULL)
00407     return NULL;
00408 
00409   for (i = 0; dependencies_ptr[i] != NULL; i++)
00410     {
00411       struct scheduler_plugin *plugin;
00412       int state;
00413 
00414       plugin = dependencies_ptr[i]->plugin;
00415       if (plugin == NULL)
00416         continue;
00417 
00418       state = plugin_get_running_state (plugin);
00419       switch (state)
00420         {
00421         case PLUGIN_STATUS_UNRUN:
00422           {
00423             struct hash **deps_ptr;
00424             struct scheduler_plugin *ret;
00425 
00426             deps_ptr = dependencies_ptr[i]->dependencies_ptr;
00427             if (deps_ptr == NULL)
00428               return plugin;
00429 
00430             ret = plugin_next_unrun_dependencie (sched, deps_ptr);
00431             if (ret == NULL)
00432               return plugin;
00433 
00434             if (ret == PLUG_RUNNING)
00435               flag = 1;
00436             else
00437               return ret;
00438           }
00439           break;
00440         case PLUGIN_STATUS_RUNNING:
00441           flag = 1;
00442           break;
00443         case PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE:
00444           scheduler_rm_running_ports (sched, plugin);
00445           plugin_set_running_state (plugin,
00446                                     PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE_AND_CLEANED);
00447           break;
00448         case PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE_AND_CLEANED:
00449           break;
00450         }
00451     }
00452 
00453   if (!flag)
00454     return NULL;
00455 
00456   return PLUG_RUNNING;
00457 }
00458 
00459 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00460 
00461 /*
00462  * Enables a plugin and its dependencies
00463  */
00464 static void
00465 enable_plugin_and_dependencies (plugins_scheduler_t shed,
00466                                 struct arglist *plugin, char *name,
00467                                 GHashTable *deps_table)
00468 {
00469   struct hash **deps_ptr;
00470   int status;
00471   int i;
00472 
00473   if (plugin == NULL)
00474     return;
00475 
00476   if (g_hash_table_lookup (deps_table, name))
00477     return;
00478   else
00479     g_hash_table_insert (deps_table, g_strdup (name), name);
00480 
00481   deps_ptr = hash_get_deps_ptr (shed->hash, name);
00482 
00483   status = plug_get_launch (plugin);
00484   if (status == LAUNCH_DISABLED)
00485     plug_set_launch (plugin, LAUNCH_RUN);
00486 
00487   if (deps_ptr == NULL)
00488     return;
00489   for (i = 0; deps_ptr[i] != NULL; i++)
00490     {
00491       struct scheduler_plugin *p;
00492       p = deps_ptr[i]->plugin;
00493       if (p != NULL && p->arglist != NULL)
00494         enable_plugin_and_dependencies (shed, p->arglist->value,
00495                                         p->arglist->name, deps_table);
00496     }
00497 }
00498 
00499 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00500 
00501 plugins_scheduler_t
00502 plugins_scheduler_init (struct arglist *plugins, int autoload,
00503                         int only_network)
00504 {
00505   plugins_scheduler_t ret = emalloc (sizeof (*ret));
00506   struct arglist *arg;
00507   int i;
00508   struct hash *l;
00509 
00510   if (plugins == NULL)
00511     {
00512       efree (ret);
00513       return NULL;
00514     }
00515 
00516   /* Fill our lists */
00517   ret->hash = hash_init ();
00518   arg = plugins;
00519   while (arg->next != NULL)
00520     {
00521       struct scheduler_plugin *scheduler_plugin;
00522       struct list *dup;
00523       char *oid = (char *)arg_get_value (arg->value, "OID");
00524       if (! oid) continue; // This would be a serious problem as it shouldn't be
00525       nvticache_t *nvticache = (nvticache_t *)arg_get_value (
00526         arg_get_value (arg->value, "preferences"), "nvticache");
00527       nvti_t *nvti = (oid == NULL ? NULL : nvticache_get_by_oid (nvticache, oid));
00528       int category = nvti_category (nvti);
00529 
00530       scheduler_plugin = emalloc (sizeof (struct scheduler_plugin));
00531       scheduler_plugin->arglist = arg;
00532       scheduler_plugin->running_state = PLUGIN_STATUS_UNRUN;
00533       scheduler_plugin->category = category;
00534       scheduler_plugin->timeout = nvti_timeout (nvti);
00535 
00539       scheduler_plugin->required_ports = str2arglist (nvti_required_ports (nvti));
00540       scheduler_plugin->required_udp_ports = str2arglist (nvti_required_udp_ports (nvti));
00541       scheduler_plugin->required_keys = str2arglist (nvti_required_keys (nvti));
00542       scheduler_plugin->mandatory_keys = str2arglist (nvti_mandatory_keys (nvti));
00543       scheduler_plugin->excluded_keys = str2arglist (nvti_excluded_keys (nvti));
00544 
00545       nvti_free (nvti);
00546 
00547       if (category > ACT_LAST)
00548         category = ACT_LAST;
00549       dup = emalloc (sizeof (struct list));
00550       dup->name = scheduler_plugin->arglist->name;
00551       dup->plugin = scheduler_plugin;
00552       dup->prev = NULL;
00553       dup->next = ret->list[category];
00554       if (ret->list[category] != NULL)
00555         ret->list[category]->prev = dup;
00556       ret->list[category] = dup;
00557 
00558       hash_add (ret->hash, arg->name, scheduler_plugin);
00559       arg = arg->next;
00560     }
00561 
00562   for (i = 0; i < HASH_MAX; i++)
00563     {
00564       l = &ret->hash[i];
00565       while (l != NULL)
00566         {
00567           hash_fill_deps (ret->hash, l);
00568           l = l->next;
00569         }
00570     }
00571 
00572   if (autoload != 0)
00573     {
00574       arg = plugins;
00575       while (arg->next != NULL)
00576         {
00577           /* deps_table is used to prevent circular dependencies. */
00578           GHashTable *deps_table;
00579 
00580           deps_table = g_hash_table_new_full (g_str_hash, g_str_equal, g_free,
00581                                               NULL);
00582           if (plug_get_launch (arg->value) != LAUNCH_DISABLED)
00583             enable_plugin_and_dependencies (ret, arg->value, arg->name,
00584                                             deps_table);
00585           arg = arg->next;
00586           g_hash_table_destroy (deps_table);
00587         }
00588     }
00589 
00590   /* Now, remove the plugins that won't be launched */
00591   for (i = ACT_FIRST; i <= ACT_LAST; i++)
00592     {
00593       struct list *l = ret->list[i];
00594       while (l != NULL)
00595         {
00596           if (plug_get_launch (l->plugin->arglist->value) == LAUNCH_DISABLED)
00597             {
00598               struct list *old = l->next;
00599 
00600               if (l->prev != NULL)
00601                 l->prev->next = l->next;
00602               else
00603                 ret->list[i] = l->next;
00604 
00605               if (l->next != NULL)
00606                 l->next->prev = l->prev;
00607 
00608               efree (&l);
00609               l = old;
00610               continue;
00611             }
00612           l = l->next;
00613         }
00614     }
00615 
00616   if (only_network)
00617     {
00618       for (i = ACT_GATHER_INFO; i <= ACT_LAST; i++)
00619         {
00620           ret->list[i] = NULL;
00621         }
00622     }
00623   return ret;
00624 }
00625 
00626 
00627 
00628 struct scheduler_plugin *
00629 plugins_scheduler_next (plugins_scheduler_t h)
00630 {
00631   struct list *l;
00632   int category;
00633   int running_category = ACT_LAST;
00634   int flag = 0;
00635 
00636   if (h == NULL)
00637     return NULL;
00638 
00639   for (category = ACT_FIRST; category <= ACT_LAST; category++)
00640     {
00641       l = h->list[category];
00642 
00643       /*
00644        * Scanners (and DoS) must not be run in parallel
00645        */
00646       if ((category == ACT_SCANNER) || (category == ACT_KILL_HOST)
00647           || (category == ACT_FLOOD) || (category == ACT_DENIAL))
00648         pluginlaunch_disable_parrallel_checks ();
00649       else
00650         pluginlaunch_enable_parrallel_checks ();
00651 
00652       while (l != NULL)
00653         {
00654           int state;
00655 
00656           state = plugin_get_running_state (l->plugin);
00657 
00658           switch (state)
00659             {
00660             case PLUGIN_STATUS_UNRUN:
00661               {
00662                 struct hash **deps_ptr =
00663                   l->plugin->parent_hash->dependencies_ptr;
00664 
00665                 if (deps_ptr != NULL)
00666                   {
00667                     struct scheduler_plugin *p =
00668                       plugin_next_unrun_dependencie (h, deps_ptr);
00669 
00670                     switch (GPOINTER_TO_SIZE (p))
00671                       {
00672                       case GPOINTER_TO_SIZE (NULL):
00673                         scheduler_mark_running_ports (h, l->plugin);
00674                         plugin_set_running_state (l->plugin,
00675                                                   PLUGIN_STATUS_RUNNING);
00676                         return l->plugin;
00677 
00678                         break;
00679                       case GPOINTER_TO_SIZE (PLUG_RUNNING):
00680                         {
00681                           /* One of the dependencie is still running  -  we write down its category */
00682                           if (l->plugin->category < running_category)
00683                             running_category = l->plugin->category;
00684                           flag++;
00685                         }
00686                         break;
00687                       default:
00688                         {
00689                           /* Launch a dependencie  - don't pay attention to the type */
00690                           scheduler_mark_running_ports (h, p);
00691                           plugin_set_running_state (p, PLUGIN_STATUS_RUNNING);
00692                           return p;
00693                         }
00694                       }
00695                   }
00696                 else            /* No dependencies */
00697                   {
00698                     scheduler_mark_running_ports (h, l->plugin);
00699                     plugin_set_running_state (l->plugin, PLUGIN_STATUS_RUNNING);
00700                     return l->plugin;
00701                   }
00702               }
00703               break;
00704             case PLUGIN_STATUS_RUNNING:
00705               {
00706                 if (l->plugin->category < running_category)
00707                   running_category = l->plugin->category;
00708                 flag++;
00709               }
00710               break;
00711 
00712             case PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE:
00713               scheduler_rm_running_ports (h, l->plugin);
00714               plugin_set_running_state (l->plugin,
00715                                         PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE_AND_CLEANED);
00716               /* no break - we remove it right away */
00717             case PLUGIN_STATUS_DONE_AND_CLEANED:
00718               {
00719                 struct list *old = l->next;
00720 
00721                 if (l->prev != NULL)
00722                   l->prev->next = l->next;
00723                 else
00724                   h->list[category] = l->next;
00725 
00726                 if (l->next != NULL)
00727                   l->next->prev = l->prev;
00728 
00729                 efree (&l);
00730                 l = old;
00731 
00732                 continue;
00733               }
00734               break;
00735             }
00736           l = l->next;
00737         }
00738 
00739 
00740       /* Could not find anything */
00741       if ((category == ACT_SCANNER || category == ACT_INIT
00742            || category == ACT_SETTINGS) && flag != 0)
00743         {
00744           pluginlaunch_wait_for_free_process ();
00745           flag = 0;
00746           category--;
00747         }
00748 
00749       if (category + 1 >= ACT_DENIAL && flag && running_category < ACT_DENIAL)
00750         {
00751           return PLUG_RUNNING;
00752         }
00753     }
00754 
00755 
00756   return flag != 0 ? PLUG_RUNNING : NULL;
00757 }
00758 
00759 
00760 void
00761 list_destroy (struct list *list)
00762 {
00763   while (list != NULL)
00764     {
00765       struct list *next = list->next;
00766       efree (&list);
00767       list = next;
00768     }
00769 }
00770 
00771 
00772 void
00773 plugins_scheduler_free (plugins_scheduler_t sched)
00774 {
00775   int i;
00776   hash_destroy (sched->hash);
00777   for (i = ACT_FIRST; i < ACT_LAST; i++)
00778     list_destroy (sched->list[i]);
00779   efree (&sched);
00780 }
